channel.title: Server Status Help
channel.description:
Whenever I try to post my server on the Server Status page, it always give me the same error of "Your Server is Offline."
However my server is clearly on. I made sure I entered the correct IP, Port, and Server Version in. Can someone help?
Btw I am using Hamachi

item.title: Server Status Help
item.dc:creator: @john55223v2 john55223v2
item.description:
@john55223v2 wrote:

try using utorrent, simply install utorrent then go into options>preferences>connection then change port to what ever your source is, to find your source port find server and check both of em the one with 3 lines is the one with port then exit everything, open no-ip duc, then run your server SOURCE NOT CLIENT, then run utorrent. then go on rune locus and use status checker. if it doesn’t work than find more tutorials.

Read full topic
